Figure 10:FreSca improves qualitative depth map predictions for input RGB images (top).Red arrows indicate regions of interest, with zoomed-in views shown on the right for each image. Visual comparison between Marigold[26](bottom) and Marigold + FreSca (middle) demonstrates that our method generates depth maps with more distinct object shapes, effectively reducing blurriness and recovering missing structures present in the original Marigold results.
Figure 11:FreSca improves the depth estimation results of ChronoDepth[42]across different frames without compromising the temporal consistency.
